alert.note: Alert for Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 27 at 12:29PM MST until December 28 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches in the mountain ranges and in the southern portion of Yellowstone National Park. Snowfall of 5 to 10 inches in the northern portion of the park. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park, Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains and Salt River and Wyoming Ranges. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult over mountain passes. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute over Teton Pass. Visibility will be severely reduced at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Salt River and Wyoming Ranges; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains; Yellowstone National Park
